edu.stanford.ejalbert.exceptionhandler
Interface BrowserLauncherErrorHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
BrowserLauncherDefaultErrorHandler
public interface BrowserLauncherErrorHandler

This is an interface to be used by the BrowserLauncherRunner for handling exceptions. Applications should implement this interface to handle exceptions in an application specific manner.

Author:
Jeff Chapman

Method Summary
 void handleException(Exception ex)
          Takes an exception and does something with it.
 

Method Detail

handleException

    public void handleException(Exception ex)
Takes an exception and does something with it. Usually the implementing class will want to log the exception or display some information about it to the user.

Parameters:
ex - Exception
